profiles.name: Earnest Explorer
profiles.pattern: EF > BS && EF > RM && RM > BS

fallbacks.name: Unicorn
fallbacks.description: You’re exceptional, balanced, and don’t fit neatly into any one category. That’s your superpower.

fallbacks.name: Evergreen Wanderer
fallbacks.description: You’re consistent and curious, still exploring your inner map.

fallbacks.name: Rubber Ducky
fallbacks.description: Self-aware and bobbing along. You’ve got insight, just need a little more integration.

fallbacks.name: Delicate Teacup
fallbacks.description: Tender but hesitant. You’re doing your best not to spill.

fallbacks.name: Rollercoaster Rider
fallbacks.description: You’re a thrill to love, but buckle up — you’re still figuring out emotional stability.

fallbacks.name: Stop Sign
fallbacks.description: Something’s gotta pause. Consider a full system reboot and some healing space.

fallbacks.name: Emotional Arsonist
fallbacks.description: You light fires to see who runs. There’s healing to do underneath the defense.

attachmentStyles.name: Anxious-Leaning Secure
attachmentStyles.notes: Mostly secure but may seek reassurance.

attachmentStyles.name: Anxious or Avoidant
attachmentStyles.notes: Likely to struggle with consistent relational strategies.

attachmentStyles.name: Disorganized
attachmentStyles.notes: Fluctuates between craving and fearing connection.
